name: The Machine Age #2
description: How much power do we want to give to machines? How much energy, our time, our lives we want to use to feed them? What are they giving to us? We build machines. Increasingly, and no question about it, machines build machines, replicating their image and functions over and over again, and mutating, improving themselves. For us, for them. Machines are here to stay. Which is stronger, human with a machine or human alone. Or machine alone vs. human alone?
